title: Pink Slime Block
summaries: The Pink Slime Block can be created with Pink Gel if the player is near a Solidifier. Landing on a Pink Slime Block causes the player to bounce. Pink Slime Blocks negate fall damage when the player lands on one. Like with Slime Blocks, running over Pink Slime Blocks produces droplet particles.

The height of the bounce is dependent on the player's speed, not on the distance they've fallen. Holding a Portal Gun or riding the Slime Mount can allow for higher bounce due to the higher speed limit.
